title: Kitty Bang Bang
description: Jeff works in a resort on a tropical island paradise and has a habit of hooking up with randy tourist girls. When Kitty comes to the island for a vacation, she and Jeff immediately hit it off and find themselves embroiled in passion on the beach at night. Pretty soon she has him involved in threesomes, giving Jeff the greatest sexual experiences of his life! Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
